mapper.select: select e.EVAL_NO, e.PRODUCT_NO, e.EVAL_SCORE, e.REVIEW, e.COL, e.USER_NO, cl.CATEGORY_NAME_L, cm.CATEGORY_NAME, m.PRODUCT_NAME, u.USER_ID, id from EVALUATION e join MENU_INFO m on e.PRODUCT_NO = m.PRODUCT_NO join CATEGORY_M cm on m.CATEGORY_TYPE_NO = cm.CATEGORY_NO_M join CATEGORY_L cl on cm.CATEGORY_NO_L = cl.CATEGORY_NO join USER_INFO u on e.USER_NO = u.USER_NO join EXPERT ex on m.EXPERT_NO = ex.EXPERT_NO order by e.COL desc

select e.EVAL_NO, e.PRODUCT_NO, e.EVAL_SCORE, e.REVIEW, e.COL, e.USER_NO, cl.CATEGORY_NAME_L, cm.CATEGORY_NAME, m.PRODUCT_NAME, u.USER_ID, id from EVALUATION e join MENU_INFO m on e.PRODUCT_NO = m.PRODUCT_NO join CATEGORY_M cm on m.CATEGORY_TYPE_NO = cm.CATEGORY_NO_M join CATEGORY_L cl on cm.CATEGORY_NO_L = cl.CATEGORY_NO join USER_INFO u on e.USER_NO = u.USER_NO join EXPERT ex on m.EXPERT_NO = ex.EXPERT_NO where e.EVAL_NO=#{evalNo}
mapper.insert:
select evaluation_seq.nextval from dual
insert into evaluation(eval_no, product_no, eval_score, review, user_no) values(#{evalNo},#{productNo},#{evalScore},#{review},#{userNo})
mapper.select: select avg(e.EVAL_SCORE) as eval_score from evaluation e join menu_info m on e.PRODUCT_NO = m.PRODUCT_NO join expert ex on ex.EXPERT_NO = m.EXPERT_NO group by ex.EXPERT_NO having ex.EXPERT_NO=#{expertNo}
